title: I Have Amnesia, Don’t Be Noisy! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Business Management   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Celebrities   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Co-Workers   Cohabitation   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Early Romance   Family Business   Famous Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Helpful Protagonist   Management   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Personality Changes   Playful Protagonist   Showbiz   Siblings   Smart Couple   Wealthy Characters
author: Lu Ye Qian He   绿野千鹤
description:
When Chu Qin found his amnesiac lover, the fake fiancee his lover’s family had arranged for was with him.

Fake fiancée: I’m the person you love the most.

Zhong Yibin: ….Liar, the person I love is obviously Chu Qin.

Fake fiancée: Didn’t you lose your memory?

Zhong Yibin: F*ck! I still remember Chu Qin!

Chu Qin: “……”

Except for you, I forgot the entire world…..

Never forget Chu Qin.>
